summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 58th Street from 1st Avenue Northwest to 3rd Avenue Northwest; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15585 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
